com.eyro.cubeacon

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eyro.cubeacon.Logger

  • public final class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage Cubeacon SDK log message. The default is LogLevel.NONE.
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Eyro Labs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LogLevel getLogLevel()
      Returns the level of logging that will be displayed.
      static void setLogLevel(LogLevel logLevel)
      Sets the level of logging to display, where each level includes all those below it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(LogLevel logLevel)
        Sets the level of logging to display, where each level includes all those below it. The default level is LogLevel.NONE. Please ensure this is set to LogLevel.ERROR or LogLevel.NONE before deploying your app to ensure no sensitive information is logged. The levels are:
        • LogLevel.VERBOSE
        • LogLevel.DEBUG
        • LogLevel.INFO
        • LogLevel.WARN
        • LogLevel.ERROR
        • LogLevel.NONE
        Parameters:
        logLevel - The level of logcat logging that Cubeacon SDK should do.

      • getLogLevel

        public static LogLevel getLogLevel()
        Returns the level of logging that will be displayed.
